PilotQualificationsAndExperience.descrip: First Officer with less than 200 hours in type

PilotQualificationsAndExperience.descrip: Captain with less than 100 hours last 90 days

PilotQualificationsAndExperience.name: FlightTime
PilotQualificationsAndExperience.descrip: Flight time greater than 8 hours in the duty day

PilotQualificationsAndExperience.name: CrewRest
PilotQualificationsAndExperience.descrip: Crew Rest less than 10 hours prior to the duty day

OperatingEnviroment.name: VerticalGuidance
OperatingEnviroment.descrip: VOR/GPS/LOC/ADF (Best approach available w/o vertical guidance)

OperatingEnviroment.name: ControlTower
OperatingEnviroment.descrip: Control tower not operational at ETA or ETD

OperatingEnviroment.name: Elevation
OperatingEnviroment.descrip: Elevation of primary airport greater than 5000 ft. MSL)

OperatingEnviroment.name: StopDist
OperatingEnviroment.descrip: Stopping distance greater than 80% of available runway

OperatingEnviroment.name: PopUp
OperatingEnviroment.descrip: Pop up trip (Less than 4 hours crew notice)

OperatingEnviroment.name: Visability
OperatingEnviroment.descrip: Ceiling & visibility at destination less than 500 ft. / 2 sm

OperatingEnviroment.name: Rain
OperatingEnviroment.descrip: Heavy rain at departure and/or destination

OperatingEnviroment.name: Snow
OperatingEnviroment.descrip: Frozen precipitation at departure and/or destination

OperatingEnviroment.name: BreakAction
OperatingEnviroment.descrip: Runway braking action less than good

Equipment.descrip: MEL / CDL Items (items related to safety of flight)

Equipment.descrip: Special flight limitations based on AFM equipment limitations
